# Generated Output — Task 3

## Files Generated by Claude Opus 4.5

All files below were generated in a single pass from the UML domain model.

| # | File | Description |
|---|------|-------------|
| 1 | `pom.xml` | Maven build configuration (Java 21, jar packaging) |
| 2 | `ResourceType.java` | Enum: WOOD, BRICK, WHEAT, ORE, SHEEP |
| 3 | `BuildingType.java` | Enum: SETTLEMENT, CITY |
| 4 | `Configuration.java` | Loads `turns=N` from config file |
| 5 | `Dice.java` | Rolls two six-sided dice |
| 6 | `Bank.java` | Manages resource supply (19 per type) |
| 7 | `Tile.java` | Hex tile with id, number token, resource type |
| 8 | `Node.java` | Board intersection with adjacency tracking |
| 9 | `Edge.java` | Edge connecting two nodes |
| 10 | `Building.java` | Settlement or city placed on a node |
| 11 | `Road.java` | Road placed on an edge |
| 12 | `Player.java` | Agent with resources, build logic, random action selection |
| 13 | `Board.java` | Full hex topology, longest road calculation (DFS) |
| 14 | `CatanGame.java` | Game loop: setup phase, rounds, resource distribution, win check |
| 15 | `Demonstrator.java` | Entry point with `static void main` |

## Compilation and Execution

```bash
$ mvn compile
# BUILD SUCCESS — 14 source files compiled

$ mvn -q exec:java -Dexec.mainClass="ca.mcmaster.se2aa4.catan.Demonstrator"
# Game runs, produces output in [Round] / P[id]: [Action] format
```

## What Was NOT Modified After Generation

The code in `src/main/java/ca/mcmaster/se2aa4/catan/` is the raw output from the AI, unmodified. No manual edits were applied to the generated code for the purposes of Task 3.
